title: New Cisco tools aim to enable green networks, data centers - TechTarget
summary: Cisco emphasizes sustainability as vital to its strategy, updates products to aid in sustainability goals. Companies benefit from prioritizing sustainability. Cisco's experience in sustainability reporting and product design showcased at Cisco Live 2023. Modernizing data center networks for improved energy efficiency and reduced costs.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses Cisco's efforts towards sustainability, including reducing energy consumption, improving sustainability in its supply chain, and designing eco-friendly products.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article highlights Cisco's introduction of new environmental-friendly products and processes that differ significantly from its previous offerings and align with its sustainability goals.
green_product: TRUE. Cisco's eco-friendly networking products and emphasis on sustainable product design align with the comprehensive definition of a green product, focusing on reducing environmental impact throughout the product life cycle.
green_process: TRUE. The article discusses modernizing data center networks to improve energy efficiency, reduce waste, and promote sustainability, aligning with the definition of green processes that minimize environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334210 - Telephone Apparatus Manufacturing, 541510 - Custom Computer Programming Services, 541690 - Other Scientific and Technical Consulting Services, 517110 - Wired Telecommunications Carriers
